review_text:
Good place for a group of 4.
Stove wasn’t working but Janice got it repaired promptly.
our stay was convenient to down town and extremely close the Cane River. our family reunion was in Shady Grove so we didn't have to go far also the. The house is beautiful. I will book again
Amazing Host !
Very smooth amazing host would love to stay here again

Janice
Was very accommodating to my family during our trip. We had to find alternate accommodations quickly. Janice was more than happy to help. Very lovely home with beautiful decor.
The house was amazing and a perfect location to walk everywhere. Janice was super responsive and helpful. 10/10 definitely recommend!!!!!

Loved this place. The art deco decor was awesome. You can tell that Janice has spent a lot of effort making sure that you have everything you need. House is walkable to front street and all there is to see and do there. Janice's communication is excellent. There was an issue with the air-conditioning for one of the rooms. Janice let us know ahead of time and made sure that we had sleeping arrangements for the affected guests in our party. Excellent house, excellent communication, I would stay here again!
A really nice place. Easy walking to dining and front street activities and shopping. Hosts are very responsive to questions and needs.

Amazing experience! Everything was top teir design and spotless! Stayed for a week and didn’t want to leave! Very specious and the owner super responsive to any and every question. They’re nice beautiful souls! Even bought the children of the house Easter gifts sent by Walmart! We will be doing this trip every year

We really enjoyed our stay in Janice’s beautiful AirBnb. Gorgeous interiors and you can tell every detail was very well thought out. Very comfortable for all of us, plenty of space. I only wish we had flexible check-in because we arrived 4 hours early with a newborn, one pregnant woman and 4 kids under 5, and we had to just wander around town in the heat until 3pm. With that said, it’s ok because I understand hosts aren’t always able to accommodate special requests. Janice was extremely responsive and clear in her communication and also reached out when she found some items we left behind. She was helpful and available to coordinate a pickup of our things a few days later. I really appreciated that! Overall, wonderful stay!!! Definitely recommend !!
Worked very well for 7 people. Clean and close to everything.

Janice was fantastic !! From making the reservation to answering a few questions. The house is absolutely adorable, we felt right at home. We will definitely be back in the spring. Thank you Janice for sharing your home with us.

My sister, nieces, and I stayed here to be close to Front Street for Christmas on our girls' getaway. It was very convenient, beautifully decorated, and comfortable. Janice was a pleasure to deal with and quick to answer all of our questions. She has obviously put a lot of work into restoring this beautiful home!
This place was lovely! Very clean, up-to-date, easy to find, and walkable to downtown. I will definitely be booking with her again. Her fur. Babies are precious too.

This was a wonderful place for my sister and me to meet for a couple of days. The house was so pretty but also very comfortable! We didn’t need much for our stay, but the house had everything we would need. It was a 5 minute walk to Front Street which was great! I loved everything about the house! We will definitely stay there again!

My husband and I had a wonderful stay at Shanda's place . It was exactly how we wanted to spend a long, quiet Memorial Day weekend. The guesthouse is very relaxing, peaceful and in a great location. It was a very easy walk to town where we could enjoy restaurants and the farmer's market. It was also a short easy drive to Melrose Plantation. We truly enjoyed our stay!
Another fabulous trip to Belle Vue Guesthouse! See y'all next month!

We had a wonderful time here. The place is spotless, well equipped and beautifully decorated. The location can't be beat. Walking distance to shops, restaurants and the river front. Highly recommended.
Always a relaxing stay at Belle Vue! Looking forward to next visit.

This is my 3rd time staying here, and it is so quaint, beautiful, and clean. We always enjoy our stay, and there is just something about the “old, creaky floors” that is so charming.
We spend a lot of time in Natchitoches, and we would stay here even more often if it were pet-friendly.
Adorable and very clean. A short walk across the bridge to Front Street. Thank you. And…..the sheets smell amazing. lol. What do you use?
Another dreamy stay at Belle Vue! Always a quiet, lovely trip. Looking forward to the next!
This was our second visit to Shanda’s place and it was just as comfortable and enjoyable as the first. Thank you for allowing us to visit your place.

This place was perfect for our weekend getaway! It's located within walking distance to the cute downtown area so you don't have to worry about parking. The owner was very responsive and the place was just too cute! We will definitely be back!
Quaint and peaceful. Loved the vibe and overall experience. The bridge is one block over to front street. Great location.
Great stay for a girls weekend! Awesome spot for exploring!
Everything was as advertised and we will be staying here again and will recommend.
The Belle Vue was the cleanest place we’ve ever stayed! This was a quaint and stunning residence! Everything we needed was provided by our host.

Cute little home. Nicely decorated. The bed in the big bedroom was really comfortable. The kitchen is fully stocked. She even had coffee and creamer. The WiFi was strong. It was super easy to walk to downtown. The only thing I thought was a bit pricey was the $125 cleaning fee.
What a charming cozy place! Beds were super comfortable and the place was so clean! Will definitely book again sometime!!

Shanda’s place was wonderful. This place was very clean, in a great location, the beds were comfortable and there was two separate sitting areas with comfortable furniture and plenty of room to rest and relax. Shanda was very quick to respond and was very kind and had great recommendations. We would definitely stay here again any time we are in the area. Great host and great Airbnb. No complaints at all.
Loved our stay at Belle Vue! Prime location for all events in the Natchitoches riverfront area! The space was beautifully decorated and very comfortable. We will definitely stay here again!
This place was beautiful with high end decorations and linens. A very homey short stay.
Beautiful home with a cozy atmosphere and very clean. Shanda was quick to respond and helpful. We loved how close we were to downtown. Would stay again!

This was truly a slice of heaven. Christmas decorations were still up which made our stay even more enjoyable since we came to see the lights downtown before the 6th of January when they ended. Was very clean, made us feel right at home and could not believe all the amenities in the kitchen. We enjoyed the beautiful walk into town across the bridge and the local downtown was like a walk into the past. Highly recommend!
Great view of the fireworks show from out upstairs balcony! The fact that her place was so impeccably decorated with Christmas items was ama I g!

Shanda's place is awesome! Great location - walking distance to downtown. Very comfortable living space - with all the amenities anyone would want. Responsive friendly host - what more could you ask for!

The location was walkable to all the shops and restaurants on the river. The fireworks show was easily seen from the balcony. The unit had everything we needed plus hot cocoa station (major plus for me) and decorated for Christmas.
We were looking for a Christmas experience and this did not disappoint. Hope to return next year.
The only downside were parts of the unit that have original wood floors. They are beautiful but we all felt like we were making too much noise walking around since it is an upstairs unit.
Comfortable, convenient location, beautiful furnishings, loved the Christmas decor! Felt right at home as we always do when we stay here! Excellent host!
Awesome place!!! She had everything decorated for Christmas!! The beds were comfortable the place was clean. A great place to go!!

This little peace of heaven is perfect. We walked from the home to downtown and it was a very short walk. The amenities were unexpected and the decor is lovely. One of the cleanest air n b’s I have ever stayed in. We could her the bands from the balcony which was nice and could see the Christmas lights. The hostess is a true sweetheart. She was very accommodating to our situation
Excellent!!!! Would definitely stay there again.
Beautiful home and so well appointed for the holidays. We loved our stay!
Absolute perfection. All expectations exceeded. Thank you so much to Belle Vue’s amazing owner and host. You made our family trip a memorable one.

So full of Christmas cheer beautiful decorations. This was our second year looking forward to the third.
Thanks for a great experience.

Belle Vue was the most charming Airbnb place! Ms. Shanda was wonderful to work with. The place was located just a short walk to the downtown area. It was decorated beautiful for Christmas. We made lots of memories as a family and will definitely be back.
location was amazing ,very clean an spacious definitely will stay again

Such a comfortable and lovely home in a great location. Shanda had decorated for Christmas and the guesthouse was beyond charming and full of holiday cheer. Perfect spot for our family. We would definitely stay here again.
Very beautifully decorated, nicely furnished guest house in a quiet location. We had a very enjoyable girls trip with lots of laughs shared around the dining table.

My daughter and I enjoyed our accommodations. It was everything we had hoped for and more. We especially liked that it was within walking distance to town and local restaurants. One of our favorite parts was the large porch area which gave us a perfect view of the Cane River and a nice place to sit and talk. The beds were soft and cozy and the sun porch was ideal for eating our meat pies!! Shanda was a perfect host!
Absolute stunning place!
This was our second stay with Shanda and would definitely stay again. Convenient location, clean and well equipped, and she is a great host.
Another perfect visit! Looking forward to going back!
The Belle Vue Guesthouse is so lovely, adorable, and quaint. My friend and I loved our weekend stay. It was so cozy and comfortable. We would both recommend again and again!

GREAT location, minutes to Front Street which was a huge deal for us! Covered, off street parking was nice too. Although the home is beautiful and very comfy, and we would rent again, just a few things to mention. No place to unpack or hang clothes (closet/dresser space), or mirror for dressing in the small bedroom. There is only one TV in the master bedroom. One for families to share in the living room or sunroom would be great.

Shanda was extremely helpful and patient when we needed help entering because I had not read her email with the entry instructions. The place was spacious and beautifully decorated with a fall theme. My husband and I were looking for a place to relax for a few days and everything to make us feel right at home was there: extra blankets, comfortable furniture, a fully equipped kitchen, and games. Meanwhile restaurants, shops, and fun activities were within walking-distance.
This place is truly a gem! Decorated lovely, cozy, immaculate, so welcoming, overall amazing! We plan to go back. Shanda was so helpful!
Shanda’s place was a great and much needed get-away. Natchitoches is a charming town and the accommodations were within walking distance.
We always love staying here when we visit Natchitoches, it is our favorite home away from home!

Shanda’s place was perfect for my daughter and I. Very clean, well equipped and walking distance to excellent restaurants!
Loved our visit!
Thanks for the great hospitality!!
Shanda is my favorite host, ever. We feel right at home at Belle Vue!

Shanda has a beautiful, private space that is well-outfitted to deliver a delightful stay. We felt right at home from the start. Excellent coffee was even provided! Could not have been a better location very close to the Cane River and Front Street, yet quiet and private. If we make it back to LA, we will definitely stay there again.

Shanda’s place was amazing! It was very peaceful and relaxing. We had every thing we needed and then some! Shanda was quick to respond and was very understanding of our situation when we cancelled secondary to a family emergency. As it turned out, we were able to come late and spend a few days and we are so glad we did! Wonderful stay!

Our stay at Shanda’s was absolutely perfect! She was so helpful and had awesome communication from the get go. Her place was beautiful and spotless. Walking distance to everything! Love the town! Would 100% come back in a heartbeat!
Great location to downtown so it’s perfect!
This was our first experience with an air B&B and it was Great! We will definitely be back
Amazing. Beds are super comfy.
Another excellent stay at Belle Vue! Cannot recommend enough. Already have reservation to return next month!
We loved our stay! The little upstairs cottage was exactly as pictured. Spotless and full of amenities.
Our stay at Shanda's was amazing. The home looked exactly like the photos. It was quiet and convenient and we will definitely be staying there again!
Beautiful 2nd story cottage. Very nicely decorated. Comfy. The porch and sun room are such a draw.
This guesthouse was so cute and perfect for the occasion!
We loved our stay at Shanda’s place! Perfect location. Comfy and cozy. I suspect this will become our home away from home as our daughter attends NSU!
The location was great, its walking distance to lake front and eating areas. A nice place to kickback and relax
Place was in great shape and very homie. Really close to old town which was great for getting food and exploring.
I believe this was our fourth stay. We just love it! A true home away from home! ❤️

Came to Natchitoches for Jazz Fest. We found Shanda's place and couldn't believe how inexpensive it was compared to what the hotels were gouging, I mean charging. We booked it immediately. Since it has two bedrooms we asked another couple to go with us. The place was extremely nice, extremely clean, and had plenty of room. We loved the sun room. The location was great as well. I didn't time it, but it only felt like a 5 minute or so walk to Front Street where all the festivities were. Shanda was great at responding quickly to any questions I had. The place was very comfortable, quiet, and very well supplied for all of our needs. We did not need to contact Shanda for anything, we had everything needed for a two night stay. I definitely recommend this place for your stay in Natchitoches.
The Manasco's
Shanda's place is beautiful and very cozy. She is also a great host. I highly recommend her place to anyone visiting the region.
Another great stay at our favorite spot in Natchitoches! Comfortable, clean, well equipped, beautiful furnishings, everything you need for a nice quiet getaway!
Good stay for the money!

This is the second time we have stayed here, and it is one of the cleanest AirB&B's I have ever stayed in. The coffee bar and snacks are also a nice touch after a long day of driving. The double-seating area is nice, too, with beautiful windows and comfortable chairs.
It was very clean and within walking distance of Front Street. I will definitely go back.
Perfect weekend getaway. Shanda’s guesthouse was clean, comfortable, and was walkable to downtown. We had a wonderful experience.
Very cute, comfortable, great location, clean. Would highly recommend to others! Thanks for having us Shanda!!!

Shanda was an incredible Host & her beautiful Natchitoches Louisiana historical heritage home was to research our French-Cajun-Creole Family Geniology in Grand Ecore.
My Sisters from Oregon & Arkansas, & my wife & I from California made the long-ago planned trip. Our AB&B must have been Blessed by God, & I will remember our experience there as Half-Way-To-Heaven.
Locals in Natchitoches were also very genuine, kind, & helpful in helping us in our family history research. Thus, we will make the trp again next year for more, & will book with Shanda & AB&B again.
Bless you Shanda & Thank you from us all.

This was an adorable, clean and charming place walking distance to everywhere we were planning to go.
Will definitely stay here again. It felt so homey and was so very comfortable!!
Our stay at Shanda’s was lovely. She has equipped it with everything anyone could need. It was squeaky clean & quiet. We really enjoyed it!

Such a wonderful few days spent at Belle Vue. The accomodations were absolutely beautiful, comfortable, and delightful. It was decorated so charmingly for easter. Loved the comfort of the furnishings, especially the bed. It was quiet and peaceful such a great place to relax . Parking was perfect. Would easily stay here again. Thank you Shanda for early check in!

The guesthouse was clean and comfortable. It was located very close to downtown and an easy/safe walk to many restaurants and activities. We had no issues and would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Natchitoches.
Great space. Would definitely recommend!
Very nice and clean and as advertised. The owner was very nice about a last minute date change request.
Was a great stay. Wish there would have been a bigger tv and in the living room since march madness was going on :)
Really enjoyed staying here. Felt at home. Shanda was very helpful connecting me with local pickleball players so I could get a game in during my visit.
This location was squeaky clean, charmingly decorated and had extra amenities not usually provided. We loved our stay and would definitely return.
Cute place and within walking distance to Downtown Historic District.
This was a beautiful and cozy place that made us feel right at home! It had everything we needed for homemade meals and the location was perfect!
Always an amazing stay! Love it there so much. So clean! So cute! So cozy! Looking forward to more stays.
Quaint, charming home, beautifully decorated and functional. Squeaky clean and comfortable. Close to downtown/front street. Great get away! Wonderful restaurants
Perfect place to stay for our girl’s trip. Very clean, great location, great host. Would definitely stay here again!

Love her little bungalow ( that’s what I called it). It is walkable to historic downtown, but was to cold for us in February. The place was decorated nicely, very clean and had everything you will need. Will stay here again, and probably make it a yearly visit ❤️
We loved our stay at Belle Vue! Beautiful house with great decor in the perfect location
What a delightful stay in Natchitoches! The location is perfect. The accommodations are lovely. Looking forward to staying here again!
An exceptional place to stay just a block away from the Cane River. Clean and comfortable, I highly recommend it!
Great upstairs apartment that was within walking distance to downtown. Very clean and well maintained. Highly recommend!

Well appointed space. Beautifully decorated and well thought out. We had a very relaxing stay which was exactly what we were looking for. Shanda was very nice. I would stay again if we find ourselves in the area.

Cute Christmas decor. Stylish interior. Quiet. Well equipped if want to cook. Hot choc bar. Use of half carport was needed in rain. Close to Bridge. Covered porch. 2 sitting areas. Has HVAC thermostat remote so can control temp from bed.
Block to Bridge if want to walk.
Only tv is in 1 bedroom.
High cleaning fee for short stay.
Some Airbnb cleaning fees & chores driving us back to hotels. Or bed & breakfast.
Most airbnbs take less than hour to clean. 125$/ hour is too much. Kitchen, bath, bedrooms only rooms that people use.
Only blinds in bath but on second floor.
Wonder stay, guest house was clean, private, homey, and Great location. Will definitely be staying again in the near future.

Great place to stay! We were able to walk to historic Front Street and enjoy the festivities and the shops and restaurants. Easy to get to everywhere we wanted to go. Beautiful home with choice of sitting areas, beds were comfy and all the kitchen amenities anyone would ever think of needing! Shanda and her home was great!
We were so impressed with the place. It was so cute and the Christmas decorations were an unexpected surprise!

Great stay! Perfect if you are visiting Natchitoches for the Christmas festival, such an easy walk. Bonus, my kids said they felt like we were in a Hallmark movie it was decorated so cute for Christmas. Definitely plan on visiting again!
Great host, personal and friendly! Accommodating and always willing to help with anything!! Will be back!!
Belle Vue was decorated for Christmas so beautifully that I felt like I was in a house in a Hallmark Christmas movie!!!

We had a wonderful time. Shanda was so sweet and kind. Her home was beautiful, warm, welcoming and so comfortable. It was like being home. We loved it and will be back. The nicest place we’ve ever stayed in Nachitoches
Beautifully decorated and within walking distance of downtown. You can enjoy the Saturday night fireworks from the balcony and avoid the crowds.

We enjoyed our week long stay at Belle Vue. It was beautifully decorated for Christmas and had everything you need.
We only wished it had a TV in one of the main living areas where we could of watched football.
The location is great and we look forward to going back soon.

Comfortable and a short walk Across the river from Front St. Just two houses down from the bridge taking you to the heart of Front St. Food, Fun and Shopping. You will definitely be in the mood form Christmas with a well-appointed Christmas decor in every room throughout the house. We were there the first weekend of the Christmas Lights Festival.
Literally 2-3 minute walk to the heart of the festival could have enjoyed the firework show from the balcony if we needed. Easy access with ample parking. Coded entry. Safe neighborhood. Easy access to shops and sundries without having to cross the river and deal with Festival traffic. Make sure to check out Grason Barbeque in Clarence LA. Short 12 min drive but worth every bite. Ask about their leftover Ham Bones to take home frozen to add to your next recipe of beans. Their pecan pie is second to none. No TV in the main room of house only in master bedroom. Not an issue for us but could inconvenience some.
Shanda’s place was more than we expected. Beautifully decorated and very peaceful. We loved it!
Everything was perfect! If you are visiting Natchitoches for any reason, this is a gem. As an added bonus during Christmas time, the decorations will make you joyful from check in until check out!

This was the cleanest rental we have ever stayed in! It was close enough to walk to Front Street, and comfortable enough for 3-4 people to sleep. Check-in was super-easy! And we loved that a coffee and hot cocoa station was provided. And the Christmas decorations with lights and timers were a super-cute extra that I wasn’t expecting.

A perfect stay. The home was very clean and warm. Our family of three was perfectly happy staying here. Within minutes of any restaurant and all the entertainment that Natchitoches provides. We will certainly be looking to stay in the near future.

Another great stay at our home away from home, we’ve enjoyed this rental many times and look forward to our next visit! The location is perfect—we walked to Front Street for dinner and events several times this weekend and it was an easy 5 minute walk. Host is easy to work with, we made adjustments to our reservation several times due to changing plans and it was no problem. Highly recommend!

My sisters and I stayed at the Belle Vue Guesthouse for our annual sisters weekend and we all loved this Airbnb. The decorations, all the windows with the abundance of natural light, the location, all of it. We especially loved the hammock swing chairs in the back yard and visited them every chance we got. It was a cozy place to sleep, visit, and play card games, and the walk across the pedestrian friendly bridge was pleasant and quick. We parked our cars upon arrival on Friday and never moved them again until we checked out Sunday morning. Our time in Natchitoches was full and fun and we all said we would love to stay at Shanda’s Airbnb again in the future. I think all four of us said, “I could live here” during our visit. I highly recommend this place.

Such an incredible location and the owner took great care and love in the design. So very comfortable and relaxing. Walk to Cane River and downtown shops and dinning. We give the home 5 stars +++++. We will be back! Thank you for everything!!!
Great place and very cozy!
Immaculate, beautiful place to stay, close to all things historic downtown.
Great location, very clean and a good value. We had an enjoyable time and would book again.

Wonderful stay at this lovely guesthouse once again! The host went above and beyond to help with some unexpected needs while we were there, and communication was quick and easy. Convenient to downtown, NSU, and other businesses such as pharmacy, groceries, etc. Peaceful, quiet location, comfortable furnishings, lovely decor, and a beautiful upstairs sunroom and front porch where you can see the riverfront through the trees! Our favorite hidden gem in Natchitoches!
Excellent accommodations and convenient to downtown area! Loved our stay!

This was one of the cutest BNBs we have ever stayed in. Shanda made it feel like home and by day 5 we hated to leave. Natchitoches is the greatest place to relax, learn LOTS of history (even Steel Magnolias movie sights) and this house was about 2 blocks from historical Front street. It rained much of the time we were there but we enjoyed going to magnificent restaurants and plantations so we were rarely in the rain. Thanks Shanda, for being such a great hostess!!

Shanda has created an inviting, delightful, and tranquil “home away from home.” The house far exceeded our expectations and we would definitely welcome the opportunity to stay there again in the future.
Conveniently located and perfect for a couple or small family. Full amenities and beautiful space.
It was so nice and close to everything. We walked to most places. We enjoyed our stay very much so. It was also very peaceful too.
We had a great time at the Airbnb! The location was great! It was very cute and comfortable!

This is a really cute option to the typical b n bs that are in town for couples. We stopped into town for a softball tournament and needed the two bedroom option. Very accommodating. And oh so cute and close to the historic district-just a block from the river!

Belle Vue was Lovely. Cozy, comfortable & so convenient. It was beautifully decorated, with every amenity we could think of. It was perfect for 4 ladies on a “girls trip.” Location was amazing! We could easily walk downtown, right across the bridge, and enjoy beautiful scenery along the way, not to mention the views from the upstairs porch. Highly recommend.

This was our 3rd stay at this beautiful, comfortable, and convenient guest house, and we could not be happier with our stay. The kitchen is well appointed, we had everything we needed to prepare breakfast before heading out each day. My favorite spot in this home has to be the sunroom where you will find 2 super comfortable swivel rocker chairs and a lovely view from the 2nd story windows. Grabbing food from any of the restaurants downtown near the river is easy, you can walk or drive and be there and back in no time. Check in and out is a breeze, house rules are easy and in line with every other property I’ve stayed at, and the host is easy to reach and very quick to respond. We think of this as our home away from home in Natchitoches, and we look forward to staying again!

This is a wonderful and comfortable way to visit Natchitoches. It's a short and pleasant walk across the Cane to downtown. The lodgings are spacious, beautifully decorated and very well provisioned. The privacy and quiet were additional pluses. Very nice!
Beautiful home in a great location. Clean and very tastefully decorated.

This was my family’s 2nd time staying at this Air B&B, and it was perfect again! The host is very easy to communicate with, self-check in and out is a breeze, and the accommodations are beautiful, welcoming, and so comfortable! This charming rental is becoming our home away from home, we are looking forward to staying here again next month!
A great place to stay!

We loved this Airbnb!! It is so beautifully decorated and within walking distance to the river. Shanda was an excellent host, she went out of her way to accommodate my family on our trip. I have stayed in many Airbnbs and this was one of my top stays, just so cozy and has everything you need. Thanks again.
Perfect location. Great cottage. Wonderful amenities. Can’t go wrong with Bella Vue.
Great Location for a short stay!
Fantastically located, cozy oasis just a few minutes walk from dining and shops. Celebrated the wife’s birthday and could not have been more pleased with our choice of Belle Vue. A true gem!

This was a great place to stay and we will most definitely be staying here again. Very convenient to downtown. Parked our truck and walked everywhere downtown. Enjoyed the Jazz Festival and the weather was great!!!

We had the BEST time at Belle Vue Guesthouse last weekend. This place is exactly as pictured. It is clean, charming, and so close to all the downtown action. We literally walked across the bridge to all the shopping, eating, etc… Shanda is so easy to contact and is so quick to respond to any question you may have. If you are looking for a place to stay in Natchitoches, this is it!!! You will not regret it!!
So close to downtown with comfortable furniture!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at BelleVue guest house during our mother/daughter trip to Natchitoches. The location could not be any better- within walking distance to everything we wanted to do. The home is super clean, well-appointed and serene. We enjoyed our afternoon rocking chair conversations in the sun room and on the large balcony. We will return!
It’s a lovely place, very well outfitted and beautifully decorated. Terrific location. Our visit was peaceful and relaxing.

Shanda’s home is a gem!! The decor is beautiful and welcoming. The beds are very comfortable and the two bedrooms with the Jack and Jill bathroom are great for friends or families traveling together. The modern kitchen is spotless and has anything you could want for preparing meals.
You can’t beat the location either. It is quiet and peaceful, but you are a very short and easy walk over the bridge to the restaurants and shops on Front street. Shanda is a gracious host and was quick to respond with local suggestions. I have traveled to Natchitoches yearly for the past 20 years and this is by far the most convenient and comfortable place I have stayed. I look forward to staying again next year!
Great location and cute house!

Fabulous host, adorable place. The decor was so charming and relaxing. The place was immaculate, but had wonderful little amenities that made us feel welcomed. Shanda was very responsive and went out of her way to make sure we were able to make the most of our stay. And the front porch- there is nothing quite like the feel of sitting out on the porch on a sunny day. Best Airbnb ever.
What a wonderful trip! We enjoyed every second at Belle Vue. So convenient to the heart of downtown with great walkability. A delightful place and we would stay here again.

This Airbnb is in the cutest! Shanda did a beautiful job decorating the space. Everything provided is very thoughtful and it’s extremely clean. The house is spacious and it’s located just minutes away from all of the shops and restaurants. We will definitely be back.

This is the perfect place for a stay in Natchitoches. I was impressed. The cottage was spotless, well-decorated, comfy, and only a 4 min walk across the pedestrian friendly bridge for shopping, dinner, and drinks. This place is going to be the hotspot for the Christmas festival, so snap it up while you can!
Beautifully decorated and perfect location! Charming older home completely renovated. Shanda was so helpful. Will definitely book again.

This home is wonderful! Our family of 3 was incredibly comfortable and we had everything we could have possibly needed for a long weekend visiting NSU. It was so convenient to be able to run back to the house in-between activities, the location is perfect for anything a visitor could want to do in Natchitoches. The host went above and beyond to help us when we decided at the last minute to book with her, and the communication was excellent throughout our stay. Highly recommended, and we look forward to staying here again, hopefully for a longer visit!
Excellent location!!! Cozy decorations that make you feel at home and great communication. We will be back!
The place was really clean and smelled nice, highly recommend

Very welcoming, decorative home. Amenities are nice. The rules and expectations are somewhat intimidating. The checkout is too early in my opinion. Host was very responsive and accommodated me at the last minute.
This was the perfect place for us to stay while in town for a family emergency. Gorgeous place overall and could not of asked for more.
Great spot!
Awesome place!
Property was just as described! It was within walking distance to the shops and restaurants. We will definitely stay at Belle Vue again!
Wonderful property. Convenient to everything and beds are very comfortable.

Even better than I expected! Great location, clean and very welcoming. We will definitely rebook this perfect spot for future visits to Natchitoches when we visit our son and attend football games in the fall. Thanks again for sharing your beautiful home.

With 3 kids and 2 dogs, this was the perfect Christmas gift to ourselves! The getaway was just what we needed! Hospitality was unbeatable. I highly recommend staying at Belle Vue Guesthouse. We are already looking at our calendar to plan another stay.

So happy with our babymoon destination choice! My wife and I were looking for a quiet getaway over the holidays and this spot was perfect! We went over New Year’s weekend and thoroughly enjoyed walking to downtown multiple times a day for the lights, music, and festivities. We stayed put on NYE having a feeling that we would be able to see the fireworks from the balcony and we were not disappointed! The downtown area is well within walking distance with minimal traffic and a sidewalk the entire way. Plenty of food and drink options downtown and others within a short driving distance.

This was our first time using Air B&B and it was a wonderful experience. The location was perfect, price was great, and the guest house was decorated beautifully for Christmas! Private and cozy cabin right on the Cane River! I am so happy we found the Log Cabin for our Mother’s Day trip and we were impressed by how perfectly placed it is along the Cane River. Check in and check out were a breeze and our host Darrell communicated easy directions for us on everything to know. There is enough parking in front for two cars or perhaps three of you have smaller cars parked close. The screened porch in back had a nice breeze but we also brought our fans for extra cool air while we relaxed out back. I will agree with other guests that the inside steps to go downstairs can be tricky for anyone with mobility issues. We never had any issues and just took our time going up and down. The bathroom was large and had a nice size tub that was perfect for baths with amazing water pressure for showers. The walk across the river bridge was less than 10 minutes to get to lots of food, stores and even scenic tours! We decided to take a carriage ride which you can see parked across the river. The Cane River Queen also passes by multiple times a day and there is lots of river life especially during the May weekends. We were fortunate enough to sit on the screened porch and enjoy a concert at the pavilion across the river on a Saturday night! The dock was perfect to use our stand up paddle boards we brought and also in a ‘no wake zone’ so we could tie to the dock and float to relax. My mother, sister and I had a peaceful visit and look forward to returning to this Natchitoches gem!

I stayed here for a small birthday dinner with a few close friends and family. The home is just as pictured. Very rustic and cozy. The kitchen literally has everything you could possibly need and more. Comfortable furniture. My husband fished from the boat dock area at night and caught some HUGE catfish. We would definitely stay again.
Awesome Hosts! Great place and we will be back.
We had a great time. Close enough yo town to be convenient to everything but far enough away for peace and quiet. Great house with a nice dock. Good fishing!!! Very clean.
The house was very roomy and had that home away from home feel. My sisters and I thoroughly enjoyed our time together. Plenty of towels and all the comforts of home. Loved it!
Great, great host to work with! Very accommodating ! Great views and decks on the River! Nachitoches is a lovely town!

Outstanding accommodations and wonderful, responsive hosts! This place was the perfect retreat spot for a tranquil time of much-needed R & R of fishing, boating, and just relaxing on the deck. There are multiple deck areas to find a peaceful spot alone in nature under the trees or to hang out in conversation. The cabin allows spacious room for guests to gather intimately or spread out in the kitchen and den areas. The balcony areas outside each bedroom were awesome for star watching. The hosts were wonderful and provided comfy little touches that make the cabin feel like home. We hated to leave and look forward to a return trip!

If you're looking for peace and quiet, this is the place to be. It is right on the water, plenty of large and small appliances to accomplish any fun project, and well stocked minus food products, to make you feel right at home.
Great place we had a ton of fun
The house and location is absolutely amazing. The host is very fast at responding and very helpful in any situation. Your stay wont be disappointing.
loved it. perfect for our needs. thanks so much
Home is just as described! Melissa was quick with responses for everything needed. Short drive to downtown! We will be re-booking in the future.
Amazing hospitality and heavenly home! So quiet and peaceful, as Melissa describes! Thank you so very much!
The home was just as described. Beautiful view of the river, the home was clean and well taken care of.
This was our second stay here and loved it just as we did the first time! We will definitely be back again soon!

Absolutely gorgeous and everything that we needed! Our girl’s trip was better because of this gem. Very reasonably price and it fit the six of us comfortably. The view from the back of the entire house is everything. We will most definitely be coming back!
Beautiful location, was exactly what my friends and I needed to celebrate before heading back to school and to work. Every moment there was just amazing!
Beautiful, clean home with lots of amenities. Friendly, helpful hosts. Amazing views of the beautiful Cane River. All the little touches that make a home comfortable.
Everything listed is accurate. Do not over pack like I did! Definitely a great home away from home. I had the best birthday ever!
The house was everything we needed and more! We loved everything about it! We’ve already booked our next trip!
The house was perfect and had everything we needed. The views and docks are awesome. We will definitely be renting it again. Thank you Melissa for being so prompt and kind about everything.

House was beautiful! All of the patios and balcony’s alone are the perfect place to sit and read or just watch the boats go by. It was an amazing property, sitting out watching the sunset on the river was so peaceful and relaxing. Everything was close to town, easy drive, will definitely book here again!
Expect magic, peace, serenity and a great host. Beautiful home and very relaxing.

What you may expect - everything in the listing and more. Melissa was so kind, understanding, accommodating, and very quick to respond - even after we arrived much later than expected. Her place is darling. The layout is super cool lending privacy for sleeping and spacious enough to gather the family. Sunrise on the river is beautiful, inviting just one more cup of coffee before starting the day. It’s the kind of place that makes one “smile all the way home!”
Thomas and Melissa are wonderful hosts. This house is beautiful, cozy and made me feel so at home. Thank you!!!

Perfect home for our group! Everything was so easy and I absolutely loved the home!! The beds were comfortable, the bathrooms and showers were great! Lots of parking and a great location. And, most important, great set up for coffee!!
While we were there, we were very busy, I loved waking up early, getting a cup of coffee and sitting in the beautiful living room to have my first cup of coffee each morning!!
We will be back, for sure!!
Our whole family enjoyed the stay. Great house with plenty of room. Close to all the activities of the area and sites. Highly recommended and will definitely be back.

Rachel’s place was the perfect stay for our family during our daughter’s graduation weekend. We loved the house and how close it is to Front St. Rachel was the perfect host and we would definitely stay here again.
Rachel’s place was wonderful. Everything was beautiful. Communication was wonderful. We would definitely stay there again.

We were supposed to have seven ladies staying in Rachel's house, but, it ended up that only five could come; therefore, we really had lots of room. Each of us had our own bed, as the house was so large. The house was very clean with upscale appliances. Our location could not have been better. We enjoyed walking in the neighborhood and walking across the bridge to downtown Natchitoches. There was an unbelievable amount of parking spaces which we didn't need, but would be great for some. Rachel always answered my texts when I had a question. We had a wonderful time in our "home away from home" and would certainly go there again
We loved our stay here! We will definitely be back on day!!

A beautiful home in the perfect area! Extremely clean, lots of extra towels, pillows and blankets. Everything smelled freshly laundered. Walking distance to downtown and a very short drive to NSU and LSMSA. Big, fenced in backyard perfect for playing and grilling. A separate, little game room area for kids to escape. The easiest checkout procedures of any Air BnB I’ve stayed in. Rachel was so quick to respond to any questions I had. Definitely putting this Natchitoches gem on my list!

The house was beautiful and exactly as described. I gave four stars (instead of five) because we had issues with the alarm system. Just an unfortunate fluke and Rachel (host) was super responsive. After a bit of back and forth and a few visits from the alarm company, it was all resolved. Otherwise the stay was perfect!
Beautiful property right across the street from cane river. Peaceful and beautiful property. Would definitely stay again!

We absolutely loved staying at The Cedars. There was plenty space for our family of 7. The home is welcoming & decorated beautifully. Everything was pristine!
We will definitely book again!
We had 8 adults and 2 children in our party. Spacious, cozy and within walking distance of Christmas festivities. We all enjoyed our stay!

Beautiful home! We hosted family here for the Christmas Festival. Plenty of space, clean home, wonderful kitchen! Walkable to all the events on Front Street. Walkable to restaurants, shops and the Basilica of the Immaculate Conception. The neighborhood is beautiful! We enjoyed our weekend here. Rachel was so helpful and the home was perfect for our family!
It was great very nice house and area would definitely go back

My husband and I both attended Northwestern in late 70’s and had 3 years of the Christmas festival together. This past weekend we had our family of 11 go to see how wonderful Natchitoches still is. What a perfect home to share with them. All the conveniences and so tastefully decorated for the Christmas season. Walkable to downtown and comfortable after all of the festivities. Our host was so great and responsive. You won’t be disappointed if you choose her lovely spacious cottage!

Another great stay at the Cedars House, our second this year. Everything from my previous review can be reiterated here: an absolutely beautiful home with ample space and very comfortable, with modern amenities but still retaining the charm and character that these lovely homes have. What was new for us is the beginning of the Christmas season in Natchitoches. Rachel decorates the home for the season, and the kiddos were delighted to see the Christmas tree and the lights.
The location is phenomenal for both walking to Front Street and participating in the many Christmas activities, or for staying at the house, pulling up some chairs and watching the fireworks. In my group, which is three generations of family ranging in age from late 60s to 5 years old, every single person just loves staying here. Natchitoches and the Cedars House are a new family tradition.

Such a charming place to stay. There were nine of us in our group and we were all very comfortable. The house is super clean and very spacious. We didn’t feel crowded at all. Such a beautiful city and we can’t wait to come back!

We made reservations for a girl’s weekend in Natchitoches, LA. I contacted Rachel month’s in advance and she patiently worked with me as I coordinated dates with my girlfriends. Once at the property, we found the amenities to be everything promised and much more. Everything was clean, with plenty of towels and the kitchen had everything needed! And, it was very spacious! We had an excellent experience!

The place was amazing. Very clean and user friendly. We had to alter our visit and Rachel, our host made arrangements to accommodate us. We will be staying there again.
Thanks

This home is absolutely beautiful and a perfect house for a great trip to Natchitoches! The rooms were clean and large, big open spaces for visiting with family and friends and a perfect outdoor area. Comfortably and easily slept multiple couples and kids. Rachel was easy to communicate with and assured we were settled and comfortable for our weekend. We loved this house and will absolutely be back again!

Very charming and beautiful cottage! The place was very clean and cozy, perfect location to downtown. The layout of the cottage was great for a large group and was the perfect place for our girl’s weekend! The host was extremely helpful and responsive, lots of amenities to help make it feel like home, plenty of space, organized and very welcoming. We will definitely be back! Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

Rachel’s house is very pretty, very comfortable, very clean, and more spacious than it even looks from pictures. We had 12 people including kids getting showered and ready for several events over 3 days and it worked great. Relaxing times were easy between downstairs and upstairs sofa and tv spots. The house is located in a pretty neighborhood, and just across the River (5minutes) from the beautiful downtown where we spent most of our time. Thank you Rachel, and we would definitely come back!

Very great stay! Rachel was super responsive and helped me from check in to check out. You can’t beat the location ! Literally walking distance from river bank and downtown area. Big beautiful kitchen and spacious rooms. Will definitely stay again!

Beautiful home with both old and new charm! Everything was well organized, clean and a peaceful setting. Rachel is very professional yet with a warm welcoming touch. This home is unique, comfortable and conveniently located to many of the sought-after attractions in the historic town. I would definitely stay there again and highly recommend to anyone else looking for a quality place to stay in Natchitoches! Thanks again Rachel for allowing us to book and experience your lovely home during our visit!
Beautiful home. The host was very responsive. Excellent stay.

Rachel was so helpful. I had a lot of questions beforehand, and she was always so quick to respond. The house is immaculate and has plenty of towels, kitchen gadgets & comfortable furniture. We had a pretty bad storm roll in that took out the electricity, and not only did the house generator immediately start up, but she reached out to check on us. I highly recommend!

The house is adorable!! Very clean and comfortable!! Plenty of space to park with great outdoor space and very roomy inside!! Our family enjoyed hanging out together as well as cooking meals together!! All the beds were very comfortable with good privacy!! Love this house and the location!! Rachel was very responsive and accommodating. Would only be disappointed if I couldn’t stay again on any return trips to Natchitoches.

Wonderfully cozy home with ample space, comfortable beds, full kitchen with plenty of dishes and cookware, private backyard and a great little game room for the kiddos. Our group had eight people, five adults and three children, and everyone felt right at home. It was the first Airbnb experience for the other adults and they couldn't have been happier. They originally had planned on staying at a local motel but our stay at Rachel's home made the trip so much more enjoyable. Being centrally located near the Cane River meant we were able to walk down to Front Street easily. The internet/wifi is fast and reliable. Rachel provides clear, helpful guidance on how best to enjoy the home. Will definitely book another trip here again!
Lovely clean home! We had an amazing time!

This cottage was perfect for our group and very short drive to Northwestern’s campus. Rachel answered all of our questions before our stay, and we had everything we needed. It was very clean and the beds were comfortable. Highly recommend!
Cute house, great location.
This home was so cozy and felt like home! The clean amenities and spaciousness was just an added bonus. It definitely met our expectations.

We would give it more than 5 stars if we could. Very beautiful house, well stocked kitchen, comfortable beds, and nice yard to play games in. You will want to stay here, trust me. It is a roomy house and didn't feel crowded at all even with 8 adults and 4 children. It was very clean and beautifully decorated. Even the dishes were beautiful and all matched. My family and I don't have anything bad to say about this place!

Great Location, Safe and Comfortable!!! Clean! Clean! Clean!! Did I say Clean! Lol! I am so impressed with this house it is adorable. I love every thing about it. It exceeded our expectations. We travel a lot and use VRBO & Airbnb often. This place was perfect for our family we made life long memories here. Thank you for your opening your home. I appreciate everything so much!

The house is very well located, a short walk from town and close to the grocery store and restaurants. We stayed during the Christmas festival and watched fireworks from just down the street! The beds and furniture are all comfortable and roomy. Our group of 12 never felt cramped. The host was thoughtful and communicated quickly. Super cute Christmas tree and wreaths on the front windows. You will need to bring your own seasonings, and I suggest bringing your own towels along with a few extra dish towels and a corkscrew. We would certainly stay there again if in Natchitoches!
So clean and new! Rachel was really kind and responsive.

This house was so cute!! Very spacious and clean! 3 min away from front street aka shopping, food and bars! Rachel was fast at communicating. We def plan on staying there everytime we visit our fam in Natchitoches
Rachel’s house was awesome. Very clean, comfortable and well equipped. Excellent location. Would definitely stay there again if the need arises.
Amazing home with beautiful furnishings and super comfortable beds. Just across the river from all the action in downtown Natchitoches.
A great home that is close enough to front street to easily walk and enjoy the sites, shops, and restaurants! Also a comfortable home that was easily accessible. Would definitely stay there again!

These are quiet and cozy cabins surrounded by big shade trees. Out on the back porch you can relax on a porch swing and see the river flowing and hear the birds chirping. There is a small fire pit and a small charcoal grill right off the deck. The floating dock is great for fishing and is next to a private boat ramp. The gar were rolling and we reeled in some blue catfish.
Andrea was very responsive to our questions and concerns and recommended a few local restaurants to check out during our stay.
Andrea was so easy to work with! Her cabin was so peaceful and in a beautiful location! We will definitely be back!
Awesome host… Very relaxing and peaceful!!! 10/10
We loved our stay at the cabins on Horseshoe Hills Ranch! Very cozy, clean, looked just like the pictures. Loved the porch in the back to relax and sip coffee. Would totally stay here again!

My family and I loved the cute little cabins. They reminded us of dollhouses. It was so peaceful and beautiful. My guys loved fishing from the dock . It would be a great place to launch a boat for bowfishers because the gar were rolling everywhere. We loved all the dog friends that came to visit us and my daughter and I bought carrots to feed the donkeys and the horse. We had a great time. If you love the outdoors and love animals, this is a great place to visit.
Nice peaceful cabin in the woods
We had a wonderful time staying here. Would love to see it with leaves on the trees.
Very beautiful little get away private and amazing for a cozy weekend away

Lovely little cabin and close proximity to Natchitoches and the wonderful historic downtown area with Christmas lights.. Enjoyed the local plantations - great base for seeing the area. We want to visit again in the spring.
Enjoyed my stay. Very nice management. Animal lover. Enjoyed the farm 💕
Great quite and peaceful place.
This place is so peaceful and beautiful!! We loved our stay. Definitely recommend 👍🏼

This was a long weekend for me and my friend to meet up for time together. She lives in Texas and I live in Alabama. The cabin was just what we needed. The area surrounding the cabins was impressive with the fire pit and swings around it. There were lots more to explore but we were also there for the Christmas Festival. We had a great time! We would definitely come back!
Beautiful location and cabin was great. Only thing needed is new toilet seat and mattress on double bed. It sinks in middle and is very soft. Everything else was wonderful!

We booked this cabin because we definitely don’t like the bed and breakfast or hotel atmospheres. We were pleased that the cabin was close enough to all of the Natchitoches attractions but far enough away to get away from the crowds. We would definitely stay here again! Thanks again for a peaceful getaway!

Our cabin was extremely cozy! It was peaceful, quiet, and excluded but yet close enough to town. We came down for the Christmas lights, it was perfect. Great space for kids.The beds.. WOW comfortable. The shower was nice and hot. The swing on the back porch was a perfect touch. Had all inanities to feel at home. The heater kept the place very warm. It felt as if I were in the heartland with the water and horses nearby. Sweet pups and a cat greeted us. Andrea responded in less than 30 seconds EVERY time.
Thanks to Andrea for the stay. We will be back.

Our stay started off a little rocky. The cleaning service had not cleaned the cabin before our arrival at 3. Andrea was quick to respond and allowed us to stay at another cabin that was available. This cabin was very cozy and clean. The beds were very comfortable and she had all of the amenities one might need to cook a meal. We enjoyed drinking our coffee on the patio and hanging out on the dock. There were two dogs who roamed freely who played really well with our pup. We also walked one of the trails which was really peaceful. We even lit a fire in one of the fire pits one night which was nice. Would definitely stay again.
The cabins are very nice & cozy!! Will be staying again anytime we travel to Natchitoches. 10\10 recommend.
Very nice place and responsive host.

This was the cutest cozy cabin! We have a friends weekend here and will definitely be coming back with our families!
If you are looking for a peaceful getaway spot this is it!
Loved the Cabin. Will definitely be back!

Andrea was a great hostess. We were able to get in touch with her for questions and received answers in a professional prompt manner. Everything that was promised as part of our stay was above expectations. We will be returning in the future and know that Andrea will make our stay pleasurable.

Cabin was a little smaller than expected from the pictures. It had very basic kitchen needs/supplies, but that was listed in the description. It was in a very quiet, secluded location. I was there on work, so it was exactly what I needed during my stay.
The property was exactly as described. Andrea was very responsive and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again!

I was somewhat disappointed at how "used" the appliances were. Although each of the downstairs appliances worked properly, they looked very ragged. The upstairs television never did work properly--the volume couldn't be raised beyond a whisper. The real frustration for me was the condition of the sofa and chair in the living area. They were so used, there was no way to sit on them without pain. They clearly need to be retired. Everything else about the property was excellent. Andrea was nice and responsive. Most of the furnishings in Cabin # 2 just need replacing. (Bed was fine.)
Great Stay!

Wow, what an absolutely gorgeous spot. The cabins are cozy and inviting. They sit atop a hill and overlook the river. There is an awesome fire pit with swings all around it. The whole ranch is beautiful and thoughtfully laid out and designed. Our stay was wonderful. We would definitely come back!
Small cozy cabin. Was a brief but great stay.
Great host, very peaceful and comfortable, will definitely return!
Cute rustic cabin set off in the woods. Awesome little dock with great fishing! Caught perch and brim. Would be an amazing place to garfish.
We enjoyed cooking a meal and not eating out. So quiet and pretty. Love the swing on the porch with our coffee.

This place was a pleasure to stay at. I loved the access to the fishing dock and having the capability to build a bonfire.
Great hospitality!

If you’re looking for a secluded area to stay with peace and tranquility, this is the place for you. This is the type of place we were looking for. Our only disappointment was that this cabin had not be thoroughly cleaned in a very long time. The bathroom shower doors and shower wall were dirty and dusty. The bath rug was dirty. Cabinets in the kitchen were dirt and dusty. The entrance door glass was spotty and dirty as it is the first thing you see when you get to the door. Bushes were dead at the front porch. How uninviting. Porches had but been cleaned in a long time. Dusting had not been done in a while. I don’t know what cleaning service you use, but they should be fired. This place would be a 10 if it would be cleaner.
Great location, quite and beautiful scenery.

The cabins are so beautiful! The scenery is also amazing. We truly enjoyed our stay at a beautiful ranch! Only concern was the wait at the access gate (was scared since we were coming in late the gate wouldn’t open) and the door on our cabin didn’t lock from the outside. Other than that we loved everything!
We have stayed here many times, it never disappoints!
Great place to relax!
Loved this place
Lovely peaceful place to chill out for a couple of days. Had lots of visits from the dogs and the friendly cat was a visitor that never left!

Very nice with a secluded feel but not far from shopping and eateries. Five “old friends” gathered around a fire pit enjoying an Beautiful Cool Evening. Very Relaxing. Thanks Andrea for making this a great booking experience.

Beautiful Cozy Cabin in the woods. 12/10 Highly recommend for anyone wanting to relax or just some peaceful living.
My wife and I had a great weekend stay with our pup! A short drive to the stores and restaurants downtown- highly recommend!
Very peaceful, quiet and clean. There is also a boat launch i wish i would have know about. I recommend and will be back when it warms up with a boat
Our stay was very quiet which is what we were looking for.
Lovely scenery and a peaceful, well-kept property. My entire family (and pups) enjoyed our stay.
We had an awesome time as usual. Wonderful little get away.
Highly recommended
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the cabins. We enjoyed how relaxing and comfortable they were. We will return soon.
Great little cabins in the woods. Everything you need for a little getaway.

This place is a hidden gem! Arrive during the daylight or look very closely for the cabin numbers on the Pillars on the porch they are black and hard to see. The hosts have phenomenal communication and are pretty much always available to help with anything. The cabins are basic and clean. Perfect for a getaway. we came from California to visit friends in Natchez and this was perfect for our family of 3 adults and 2 kids. There’s plenty of porch swings we spent one evening hanging out at the cabin with our friends before going to dinner and everyone loved it the kids ran and played and we sat and chitchatted. This place is the definition of peaceful and beautiful!
This is place is so charming. Andrea and her husband were so nice and welcoming. We will return.

We truly enjoyed our stay. We just needed a weekend getaway and our sons had an absolute blast. They have nice trails and beautiful set ups. Perfect for a reunion or just big group. The deck was so much fun we fished and swam.they have horses and we enjoyed the friendly cats and dogs on site. Definitely not disappointed and we will be back.
great place to stay. has everything you need and it's exactly as advertised. bring your fishing pole and tackle box
Great spot for a family

We loved the seclusion of the cabins but the closeness of town and other attractions. Everything was as described. Check in was easy. Anytime I contacted Andrea about/during our stay I had a response within an hour. We enjoyed our stay at the cabins and hope to be back in the future.
It is cute cabin. My older kids enjoyed walking the trails. The view of the river is beautiful.

Very cute and secluded place! The hostess is very kind, accommodating and attentive. She responded to messages immediately. If you like a secluded, natural setting, but close to everything, this is the place for you!
Staying at the cabins is always a lovely and peaceful experience!
Very calm and relaxing place to spend family time or a quiet getaway.

Cabins were as advertised, Rustic, Small and Quaint! They are fairly close together, similar to a camping ground. The area was quiet and the grounds were well maintained. Bathroom is downstairs from the bedroom if stairs are an issue for you.

These cabins are awesome! We throughly enjoyed the location, the remoteness, the back porch swing, the ease of entry/instructions for coming/going, etc. Beautiful, well maintained property/grounds, etc. We were 10mins from most things which was accessible but kept us feeling out of town, which we loved. It was quiet, peaceful. Highly recommend!
Andrea’s cabins are absolutely wonderful! Beyond cute and have all the amenities you’ll need. Plus, the location is peaceful! Highly recommend and will hopefully be back!
A very clean and quiet cabin. Location is very nice and not hard to find.
This place is amazing! The facilities and cabins are clean. I would recommend this place for a family reunion or a family trip.
Great place to relax and unwind from the hustle and bustle of Dallas! Nice scenery, quiet, and peaceful! I highly recommend!
Great place!

We would definitely stay again. The place is super cute. Loved sitting on the swing and drinking our coffee.
If you happen to be allergic to cats you will need to find a different place. We loved spending time with the cats. Feeding the horses was amazing.

Charming cabin in a very beautiful setting. The beds were super comfy, and we really enjoyed our quiet time. We would 100% stay here again.
Some notes before booking: The cabin is one of 6 in a semi-circle, so it's not isolated - you have neighbors. This would be a fantastic location for a family reunion with its multiple cabins, pavilions, etc. Also, bring anything for cooking you may need (including salt and pepper, coffee, wine opener) as there are only some basic utensils, pots & pans. The same also applies to toiletries - bring everything you need. The fridge is a mini-fridge, so prepare accordingly.

This cabin was perfect for our trip. It was clean and cozy. We were greeted by the sweetest little cat that the kids temporarily named “Elvis”. We even got a little surprise when we noticed the large open field with cute little fishing dock behind the cabin. The kids and dog got to run free and they absolutely loved it.
Great Location… quaint cabins… Natchitoches is such a great place to vacation!
If you want a nice and quiet place to stay, this is the place for you. No hustle and bustle of the city anywhere to be found. Cabins are cozy with beautiful scenery.

The cabin was perfect! It was clean and spacious enough for 3 women. The location was close enough to downtown for shopping and eating out, but far enough to also have peace and quiet (away from traffic and noise). Andrea answered my questions in a timely manor. I would definitely recommend staying at this ranch.
Loved the cabins and the setting. It was quiet and peaceful. A great family weekend!

The ranch is a great, affordable getaway that gives you that mountain feel even though it’s in Louisiana. We enjoyed seeing the horses and making use of the trails on the property. The listing doesn’t mention it but our cabin had mini fridges so keep that in mind if packing food. Andrea was quick to answer messages.
I had a great, relaxing time at the cabin. The 30 acres had nice scenery, trails to wonder around on, nice floating dock on the bayou. cabins were just what I needed. Would stay here again.

The cabin was cute and the surroundings were quite serene, and the location was close enough to the town, very convenient. The property was also very neat, and would recommend it for a stay. The only issue was the barn cats that refused to leave the cabin.

Andrea has a beautiful property that is located close enough to town that going is very convenient but far enough away that you feel like you are one with nature. It's quiet and peaceful. Bring some peppermints just incase because the horses are very friendly but I'm sure look forward to their treats. Some people spend a good portion of their vacation eating out and sightseeing but if you plan to spend any time relaxing and cooking at the cabin you'll want to bring the necessities plus a can opener, corkscrew, or whatever for your specific needs outside of the normal kitchen ware. My husband didn't get to do much fishing but said the little he could was quite nice, especially so if someone brought a boat. If you have the chance the horse and buggy ride and trip down the river were very interesting and well worth doing 👌 I would definitely recommend staying at Andea's to anyone considering.
This is a beautiful location. The property is well maintained. I love when I get to stay in Nachochies !!!
This cabin was so cute and adorable, that we are rebooking it again!
10/10! Would come again!
Only issue was barn cats trying to come into the cabin.

The cabin was good my family enjoyed it, just did not like there’s not much privacy. The cabins are a little close. Other than that we loved fishing and walking around out there. My kids loved the animals. We will come back!
A wonderful hidden gem! The sweet animals made our trip extra special. We can’t wait to come back!

My family of 5 spent a week at the cabins and we had a wonderful time. We hiked the trails in the woods, fished off the dock, and my kids enjoyed petting and feeding the animals. The cabin is clean and cozy and we fit comfortably with our young kids. I appreciated being able to use the laundry room whenever we needed.
The cabins are near each other but there is still plenty of privacy. This would be a perfect location for a family reunion!
Andrea is one of the most genuine and kind people I have met. The hosts are available if anything is needed. We had a great stay!
The few days that we stayed where great the cabin was very comfortable and peaceful.
Awesome place!! We will definitely return for another visit.
Such a beautiful place! Have to go back in August, will definitely be staying again if there is availability! Was lucky to get this rare find when I did!

We had a very nice and relaxing time here! Cabins are nice and rustic just like we like and the floating dock made for nice relaxing afternoons. The view from the back porch is AWESOME! The surroundings are so peaceful. We will be back!
Great cabins!
Great location! Clean and cozy. 10/10 would stay again
Lovely cabin. One of 6 in a quiet setting. Conveniently close to Natchitoches. Had a very nice time.
We had a great time and enjoyed the peace and quiet.

Absolutely loved our stay at Hidden Hills Ranch! So many things for a family to enjoy between the hiking trails through the woods to explore, to fishing in the Bayou, to visiting the horses and donkeys or relaxing on your private back porch on a swing or by the campfire right outside your door. We were so happy we brought our dog to run and play with Addie the farm dog. she literally came to the front door to get him every morning! We will definitely be back for another "unplugged" adventure with the kids.

Perfect size for two people looking to get away. Nice fishing area and trails. There is only a mini fridge and the bathroom sink is very small. Not great water pressure in the shower. The cabin is small, clean, and quiet. I would recommend staying here and would stay here again.
Beautiful and relaxing location. Very quiet, apart from the occasional other cabin guests. Lovely walks in the woods. Conveniently located near the charming town of Natchitoches.
Amazing cabin and location. Total peace and relaxation.
Cute place in scenic location, but expect rustic and nothing fancy!

We enjoyed our time in this precious cabin! Sights are beautiful and it had everything we needed. Communication was top notch and much appreciated. We stayed with a group of three adults and we had plenty of space. Highly recommend!
Will be back enjoyed our stay very much. Cool place.
